DOC.brief_summary: This randomize control study examine effect different interpersonal gratitude journal compare neutral control journal psycho social outcome .
DOC.detailed_description: This randomize control study examine effect ) reflective interpersonal gratitude journal , b ) reflective behavioral interpersonal gratitude journal , versus ( c ) active control journal , life satisfaction secondary outcome . Explanatory mechanisms test utilizing broaden-and-build theory positive emotion . Participants randomly assign one three condition three week , one month three month follow-up assessment .
